Articles.Content:
For a post I received reputation (23rd August 2014 22:48) and the user also wrote a comment.

Now that I look on my reputation site, the comment is replaced by "No Comment Made".

Is this a bug in the forum?

I've never seen that, and I don't think there's a way to edit the comment after the rep is given. I discovered this when I hit Give Rep button instead of "Report Post", gave the poster rep and told him why I thought his post was bad.

Sounds like a bug, or possibly related to the database error thing last night.
